div.p:
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xiiij die Augusti anno quo supra

Eodem die Compertum fuit per Inquisicionem legittimam quod Dauid
prat est legittimus et propinquior heres quondam Dauid prat patris
sui Igitur datum fuit in mandatis Andree Culan seniori balliuo
ad cognoscendum ipsum ad terras et annuos redditus sibi Jure
hereditario contingen'

div.head: Nomina Inquisicionis mariote Kintor
div.p:
Alexander chamer de murchill Johannes Culane thomas prat Andreas murray
senior Willelmus andirson senior Johannes moire Alexander nachty Johannes retre
henricus hourum Thomas Waus patricius rede Dauid Spens
et Willelmus philp Jurati dicunt quod quondam Richardus Kintor
auus mariote Kintor latricis presencium obiit vltra vestitus et sasitus
de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri regis de quadam terra anteriore cum
suis pertinenciis Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico furcarum ex orientali parte eiusdem
vici inter terram quondam thome de camera ex australi ex vna et terram quondam
Walteri pyot ex boreali partibus ab altera Et quod dicta mariota est vna de
legittimis et propinquioribus heredibus p quondam dicti aui sui de predicta terra Et
quod est legittime etatis Et quod valet per annum xl s' et tantum valuit tempore
pacis Et quod tenetur in capite de Suppremo domino nostro Rege per seruicium
burgagium Et nunc existit In manibus domini nostri Regis per Sexdecem
annos aut eocirca in defectu veri heredis Jus suum minime prosequentis

the saide day the aldirman and balyeis assignit tuysday that next cumis
to Jonhne Culane to ansuer perempturlie to Thome thomsone
for ij barrelis and demi of Salmond clamyt be his obligacion Ande discernit
the copy of the saide obligacion to the saide Jonhne

The saide day Alane litstar' conuikit be ane Suorne assis' William
blinsel forspekar for the wranguis' strubulance of Isabell wyf
to gilbert litstar' and Scho quytis of al strubulance

The saide day it was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Johne
of Culane forspekar that Agnes atkin the relict of vmquhile
William nory sal content and pay to William philp viij s' Scottis
money for the maile of j butht quhilkis scho occupeit of his
And gif scho previs ij termes pait atour this some within xv dais
next hereftir follouing scho is quyt of iiij s' clamyt mair' than the
saide viij s' And' falyeing tharof scho sal pay the sade iiij s'

add.foreign: copia littere assedacionis concesse Willelmo colp et cristine coniuge sue

div.p:
Be It kende tile mene be thir present lettres ws Aldirman
bailyes consall and communite of Abirdene to haue gevin grantit
ande assignit ande be thir present lettres gevis grantis and assignis to
our louettis nichbour William colp and cristiane curing his spous' our'
handbell with all the profitis commoditeis esiamentis vsit and wont
pertening tharto for the cessing of trubule and redemyng of wexacionis
ande Inquietacionis of the toune Ande specialie for the contentacione' of the tak
of half ane nethis fisching of Done decretit to thame be the lordis of our'
Souerane lordis counsall and for the remmiting of ale decretis akis Instrumentis
and writtis maide to thame tharapone To be haldin and hed ale and haill our saide
bell with the pertinence to the saidez' William and cristian Ande to the langest levar'
of thame tua thar ayris and assignez' burges Inhabitantis in the said burgh
with ale and Sundrie fredomes comoditeis asiamentis and profitis pertening or may
pertene tharto the Entre of the said William and cristian salbe In and witht
the said bell and at mertimes in wintir' next eftir follouing the dait of thir'
lettres Ande frathinfurtht to Jois' and breuk the samyn peciablie quhill
all the termes of this generale assedacione be cummyn of Abirdene Instant
be runnyn Ande at the Enteres' of the saide next generall assedacion'
to be maide your vniuersite sall wit ws to haue Set grantit
and to maill lattin Ande be thir present lettres settis and grantis and to maill
lattis to the said William and cristian all and haill the thrid part of ane
nettis fisching of the wattir of Done for all the termes of fywe yeris
the said William and cristian thar' ayris or assignez' burges Inhabitant
in the saide burgh' salbe In and with the saide thridparte nettis fisching
in continent at the wschay and ende of this generale assedacione' Instant
Ande frathinfurth to Jois' and breuk the samyn peciablie quhill all
ther termes of fiwe yeris be fullelie complet and runnyn with all and
sundrie fredomes comoditeis asiamentis and profitis pertening or may
pertene tharto to the said William and cristian the langast levar' of thame
tua thar' ayris and assignez' Induellaris In Abirdene but ony Impediment
ch or demand' Thai payand siclik malys and girssumez' as vthiris
nichbouris pais for siclik takis at the termes vsuall within the said burgh'
till ws our successouris or assignez' Ande at the Entre with the saide
fischingis the saide bell salbe vtirlie and fre at our disposicion' And'
we the said Aldirman bailyeis and consale and communite sale varand'
kep and defend' the said bell fre of ale thingis to the Entreis
of the saide general assedacione' And' thareftir the said thridparte
of nettis fisching with thar pertinence to the saide William and cristiane
thar ayris and assignez' Induellaris of Abirdene for all the termes
of fywe yeris be all Our' landis and gudis present and tocum agannis all
dedlie but fraude or gill In witnessing of the quhilkis
we haue maide our commone Sell to be appensit to thir present
lettres at Abirdene the Sevint day of October the yer'
of god jM iiijc nyntj and thre yeris befor' thir witnes'
Robert blinsell Dauid menyeis Jonhne' Colison'
burges of the said burgh and sere Jonhnne stirueling notar publicis

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xviijo
die Augusti anno quo supra

The saide day the aldirman balyeis and diuers' of the consale ande
communite of the saide burghe' grantit and promittit to pay to the priour'
and conuent of the quhit freris of this tone fourty schillingis scottis
money at the makinge of the next generale assedacion of
the girsomes of the samyn in finale pament of the five merkis clamit
be them wantand' of thar' pensione be the deces' of Sandy rolland
tollar' of this burghe'

The saide day the aldirman balyeis and diuers' of the consale and
diuers' of communite of the saide burghe' grantit and promittit to pay
to the priour' ande conuent of the blak freris of this tone fyve chaldir
of lyme or the valour of it at the makinge of the next generale
assedacion of the girsomes of the samyn in finale pament of xiij merkis
clamit be thame wantand of thar' pensione be the deces' of Sandy
rolland' tollar' of this burghe

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis assignit friday that next cumis to
Williame philp to ansuer' perempturlie to the borghe' strekit one him
be Wat atkin for the wranguis' haldin fra him of xliij s' and viij d'

The saide day Jonhne Steuarte was conuikit be ane Suorne assis'
Williame blinsele forspekar for the strubulance of henry horum to Amend'
as law wile and to forber' in tyme to Cum

The saide day it was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Dauid menyeis
forspekar that Androu lammyntone sal pay to Jonhne lammyntone xxxiij
s' and iiij d' within xv dais eftir the fest of Sanct michaele next
hereftir follouing but ony langar delay dilatour' or demavnd'

The saide day the aldirman requirit and askit at Alexander chamer in the
Schipraw to schew gif he hede ony tak be wrat or worde
of the rude malys and it suld' be kepit him

the saide day Duncan ydill was quyt of xviij s' g' and vj g'
clamyt and follouit be Anthonius laurence procurator to the tutouris of the barnys'
of vmquhile Arnalde Wanstakinburghe be ane Suorne assis'
Williame blinsell forspekar'

The saide day It was deliuerit be the counsale the aldirman and diuers'
of the Counsale present for the tyme that thai vndirstande nocht that the
goldsmythis smythis and hemmyrmene hes richt to the patronage of
Sanct ye Elegeis altar' situat' within the parys' kirk of Abirdene
Nochtwithstandinge In hoip of Augmentacion' to be maide to the Said altar
and the chaplanry begunnyn to be Infeft thai haue grantit to suffir
the saide Craftismene and mastir Androw Cravfurd chaplane presentit
to the samyn be thame to Joys' the saide altar and the seruice of it for
ane yer' next hereftir Ande gif the saide Craftismene doys
thar' diligence ande Augmentis the saide seruice eftir thar possibilite
gudlie as efferis the aldirman and consale forsaide grantit to mak
thame Souyr' of the patronage of the saide Altar' thai considerand
thar' diligence in the Ekinge of the saide seruice eftir thar' faculte

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xix die Augusti
anno quo supra

the saide day It was Statutit and ordanit be the aldirman and
diuers' of the Consale present for the tyme that ale the baxtaris
of this tone bak ij d' breide contening xxxij vnce and penny
brede contening xvj vnce gude fresche cleyne and welbakin stuff
vnmengit franche flour' be it Self and Scottis flour be It self
Ande quhay falyeis herintill thar' breide salbe eschet and thai sale
pay the vnlaw of the Court vnforgevin

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxmo
die Augusti anno quo supra

the saide day philp of Dunbrek grantit that he hede arrestit ij barrellis of
Salmond' in the handis of Jonhne of Culane be ane borghe' strekit
be thomas prat for ij barrellis of quailspet being' in ane Sellar' of
James thomsonnis et cetera

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xxjo mensis Augusti Anno quo supra

add.foreign: penes recepcionem peccunuarumpecuniarum et bonorum concessis choro de Abirdene

div.p:
The saide day the aldirman balyeis diuers' of Consale ande
communite Instantlie requerit Androw Culane yongar Ande William
futhes to resone ask and vptak ale Somes of money and
gudis grantit be the worthie nichbouris and comburges of this
tone to the byinge of the leide and ale vthir stuff conuenient
for the queir' for the kirk of Abirdene to be disponit be
the avys' of the tone and at thar' commavnde as thai think
expedient the quhilkis gudis and money thai grantit to
resaue Ande do thar' trew ande fathtfull diligence
tharto In the honor' of Sanctis nicholes thar patrone Ande to
the plesour' of the toune
